Philosophy Articles

again, loosely philosophical, more like a list of rants about random things

Yes, we have just as much to say about things as anyone else and tea can really bring some thoughts out of you. Even if you don't embibe the gracious leaf nectar we so love here at Philosotea, you'll probably still enjoy the witty remarks we make here in the philosophy section.

We like to keep our philosophy loose, most of the time. It goes down easier that way; and a swig of tea cleanses the palette afterward.
